snippet: Joe Torre and Dave Winfield will lead a good-will tour later this month. It will be Major League Baseball’s first visit to Cuba since a Baltimore Orioles exhibition game there in 1999.
abstract: Major League Baseball's chief officer Joe Torre and Player Assn special adviser Dave Winfield will head to Cuba for goodwill tour in MLB's first visit to island in 16 years; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Joe Torre and Dave Winfield will lead a good-will tour later this month. It will be Major League Baseball’s first visit to Cuba since a Baltimore Orioles exhibition game there in 1999.

headline.main: Major League Baseball Set for a Tour of Cuba
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Baseball; M.L.B. Set for Cuba Tour
